auth.agreement: By signing up, you agree to the <0>linkTerms</0> and <1>linkPrivacy</1>.

sign-in.title: Login
sign-in.subtitle: Do not have an account yet?

verify.title: Verify email
verify.subtitle: A PIN has been sent to your email. Please check your email and enter the PIN below. The PIN code time to live is 5 minutes.
verify.notice: If you have not received an email with a PIN please press resend request below.

password-reset.title: Forgot password?
password-reset.subtitle: No worries, we’ll send you reset instructions.
password-reset.notice: If you have not received an email with a PIN please press resend request below.

error.422: The email has already been taken

faq.1: Colors, fonts, shadows and many other parts are customizable to fit your design needs
faq.2: Configure components appearance and behavior with vast amount of settings or overwrite any part of component styles
faq.3: With new :focus-visible pseudo-class focus ring appears only when user navigates with keyboard

not-found.subtitle: Something went wrong...
not-found.description: Regrettably, this is simply a 404 error page. It's possible that you've entered the URL incorrectly, or the page has been relocated to a different address.
